Articles.Content: I've seen a few videos where the navball is tucked into the bottom left corner. I haven't been able to find a setting or mod that does this. Does anyone know how to reposition the navball?
Enhanced Navball lets you move the resize the navball, among other things.
Can't be done in stock. I will move your thread to the modding section so someone can suggest something for you.
As 5thHorseman said, you want Enhanced Navball
